title: Southland Tales [2006] [Eng] -Hammer71
description:
Southland Tales (2006)

Avi Size (MB) .........: 697.35 MB

Video Length ..........: 02:24:33 (144 Minutes)

Video Codec ...........: XVID (2 Pass)
Video Bitrate .........: 584 KB/s (five-eight-four)
Framerate .............: 23.976 FPS

Resolution ............: 640 x 272
Aspect Ratio ..........: 2.35:1

Audio Codec ...........: (MP3) (STEREO)
Audio Bitrate .........: 90 KB/s (VBR)
(more information below)

Audio Language ........: English

CD-R Tested ...........: Memorex CD-R (52x 700mb 80mins)
Player Tested .........: Magnavox MWD7006

Surround Sound Test ...: MTX Home Theater

I noticed that most versions of this movie have been
either 1.3GB or 800mb. While they work for viewing on
a computer or buring to DVD, it kinda leaves people that
use 700mb CD-Rs out of luck(like me).

After watching this movie on my TV in 700mb form I
decided that it was worth sharing. In my opinion it
turned out nice, actually very nice, but I&#039;ll leave that
for others do decided for themselves.

Enjoy!

*Note*
Don&#039;t let the 90 KB/s audio fool ya. The surround sound
effects worked 100% in my home theater. Oh, and the
explosions most certainly rattled the windows.

Enjoy the movie!
